question_text: When using HDMI for video but your monitor has separate analog audio inputs, how should you configure the audio?
answer_options: HDMI automatically includes audio, no configuration needed
Configure monitor to accept video on HDMI and audio on analog audio input
You cannot mix HDMI video with analog audio inputs
Switch both video and audio to analog connections
correct_answer: Configure monitor to accept video on HDMI and audio on analog audio input
explanation: Some monitors support mixed input configurations where video comes from one source (HDMI) while audio comes from another (analog input). You must configure the monitor's input settings to specify which input source to use for video and which to use for audio.
